00112 void ED_object_location_from_view(bContext *C, float *loc)
00113 {
00114     View3D *v3d= CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00115     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00116     float *cursor;
00117     
00118     cursor = give_cursor(scene, v3d);
00119 
00120     copy_v3_v3(loc, cursor);
00121 }
00122 
00123 void ED_object_rotation_from_view(bContext *C, float *rot)
00124 {
00125     RegionView3D *rv3d= CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00126     if (rv3d) {
00127         float quat[4];
00128         copy_qt_qt(quat, rv3d->viewquat);
00129         quat[0]= -quat[0];
00130         quat_to_eul(rot, quat);
00131     }
00132     else {
00133         zero_v3(rot);
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00137 void ED_object_base_init_transform(bContext *C, Base *base, float *loc, float *rot)
00138 {
00139     Object *ob= base->object;
00140     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00141     
00142     if (!scene) return;
00143     
00144     if (loc)
00145         copy_v3_v3(ob->loc, loc);
00146     
00147     if (rot)
00148         copy_v3_v3(ob->rot, rot);
00149     
00150     where_is_object(scene, ob);
00151 }
00152 
00153 /* uses context to figure out transform for primitive */
00154 /* returns standard diameter */
00155 float ED_object_new_primitive_matrix(bContext *C, Object *obedit, float *loc, float *rot, float primmat[][4])
00156 {
00157     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00158     float mat[3][3], rmat[3][3], cmat[3][3], imat[3][3];
00159     
00160     unit_m4(primmat);
00161     
00162     eul_to_mat3(rmat, rot);
00163     invert_m3(rmat);
00164     
00165     /* inverse transform for initial rotation and object */
00166     copy_m3_m4(mat, obedit->obmat);
00167     mul_m3_m3m3(cmat, rmat, mat);
00168     invert_m3_m3(imat, cmat);
00169     copy_m4_m3(primmat, imat);
00170     
00171     /* center */
00172     copy_v3_v3(primmat[3], loc);
00173     sub_v3_v3v3(primmat[3], primmat[3], obedit->obmat[3]);
00174     invert_m3_m3(imat, mat);
00175     mul_m3_v3(imat, primmat[3]);
00176     
00177     if (v3d) return v3d->grid;
00178     return 1.0f;
00179 }

00183 void view_align_update(struct Main *UNUSED(main), struct Scene *UNUSED(scene), struct PointerRNA *ptr)
00184 {
00185     RNA_struct_idprops_unset(ptr, "rotation");
00186 }

00188 void ED_object_add_generic_props(wmOperatorType *ot, int do_editmode)
00189 {
00190     PropertyRNA *prop;
00191     
00192     /* note: this property gets hidden for add-camera operator */
00193     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "view_align", 0, "Align to View", "Align the new object to the view");
00194     RNA_def_property_update_runtime(prop, view_align_update);
00195 
00196     if (do_editmode) {
00197         prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "enter_editmode", 0, "Enter Editmode",
00198                               "Enter editmode when adding this object");
00199         RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN|PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00200     }
00201     
00202     prop = RNA_def_float_vector_xyz(ot->srna, "location", 3, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Location",
00203                                    "Location for the newly added object", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00204     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00205     prop = RNA_def_float_rotation(ot->srna, "rotation", 3, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Rotation",
00206                                  "Rotation for the newly added object", (float)-M_PI * 2.0f, (float)M_PI * 2.0f);
00207     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00208     
00209     prop = RNA_def_boolean_layer_member(ot->srna, "layers", 20, NULL, "Layer", "");
00210     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN|PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00211 }
00212 
00213 static void object_add_generic_invoke_options(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00214 {
00215     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "enter_editmode")) /* optional */
00216         if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "enter_editmode"))
00217             RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "enter_editmode", U.flag & USER_ADD_EDITMODE);
00218     
00219     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "location")) {
00220         float loc[3];
00221         
00222         ED_object_location_from_view(C, loc);
00223         RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "location", loc);
00224     }
00225      
00226     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "layers")) {
00227         View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00228         Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00229         int a, values[20], layer;
00230 
00231         if (v3d) {
00232             layer = (v3d->scenelock && !v3d->localvd)? scene->layact: v3d->layact;
00233         }
00234         else {
00235             layer = scene->layact;
00236         }
00237 
00238         for (a=0; a<20; a++) {
00239             values[a]= (layer & (1<<a));
00240         }
00241 
00242         RNA_boolean_set_array(op->ptr, "layers", values);
00243     }
00244 }
00245 
00246 int ED_object_add_generic_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00247 {
00248     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op);
00249     return op->type->exec(C, op);
00250 }
00251 
00252 int ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, float *loc,
00253     float *rot, int *enter_editmode, unsigned int *layer, int *is_view_aligned)
00254 {
00255     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00256     int a, layer_values[20];
00257     int view_align;
00258     
00259     *enter_editmode = FALSE;
00260     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "enter_editmode") && RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "enter_editmode")) {
00261         *enter_editmode = TRUE;
00262     }
00263 
00264     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "layers")) {
00265         RNA_boolean_get_array(op->ptr, "layers", layer_values);
00266         *layer= 0;
00267         for (a=0; a<20; a++) {
00268             if (layer_values[a])
00269                 *layer |= (1 << a);
00270             else
00271                 *layer &= ~(1 << a);
00272         }
00273     }
00274     else {
00275         /* not set, use the scenes layers */
00276         Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00277         *layer = scene->layact;
00278     }
00279 
00280     /* in local view we additionally add local view layers,
00281      * not part of operator properties */
00282     if (v3d && v3d->localvd)
00283         *layer |= v3d->lay;
00284 
00285     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "rotation"))
00286         view_align = FALSE;
00287     else if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "view_align"))
00288         view_align = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "view_align");
00289     else {
00290         view_align = U.flag & USER_ADD_VIEWALIGNED;
00291         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "view_align", view_align);
00292     }
00293     
00294     if (view_align) {
00295         ED_object_rotation_from_view(C, rot);
00296         RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "rotation", rot);
00297     }
00298     else
00299         RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "rotation", rot);
00300     
00301     if (is_view_aligned)
00302         *is_view_aligned = view_align;
00303     
00304     RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "location", loc);
00305 
00306     if (*layer == 0) {
00307         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Property 'layer' has no values set");
00308         return 0;
00309     }
00310 
00311     return 1;
00312 }

00314 /* for object add primitive operators */
00315 /* do not call undo push in this function (users of this function have to) */
00316 Object *ED_object_add_type(bContext *C, int type, float *loc, float *rot,
00317     int enter_editmode, unsigned int layer)
00318 {
00319     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00320     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00321     Object *ob;
00322     
00323     /* for as long scene has editmode... */
00324     if (CTX_data_edit_object(C)) 
00325         ED_object_exit_editmode(C, EM_FREEDATA|EM_FREEUNDO|EM_WAITCURSOR|EM_DO_UNDO); /* freedata, and undo */
00326     
00327     /* deselects all, sets scene->basact */
00328     ob= add_object(scene, type);
00329     BASACT->lay = ob->lay = layer;
00330     /* editor level activate, notifiers */
00331     ED_base_object_activate(C, BASACT);
00332 
00333     /* more editor stuff */
00334     ED_object_base_init_transform(C, BASACT, loc, rot);
00335 
00336     DAG_id_type_tag(bmain, ID_OB);
00337     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00338     if (ob->data) {
00339         ED_render_id_flush_update(bmain, ob->data);
00340     }
00341 
00342     if (enter_editmode)
00343         ED_object_enter_editmode(C, EM_IGNORE_LAYER);
00344 
00345     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_LAYER_CONTENT, scene);
00346 
00347     return ob;
00348 }
00349 
00350 /* for object add operator */
00351 static int object_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00352 {
00353     int enter_editmode;
00354     unsigned int layer;
00355     float loc[3], rot[3];
00356     
00357     if (!ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL))
00358         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00359 
00360     ED_object_add_type(C, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type"), loc, rot, enter_editmode, layer);
00361     
00362     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00363 }

00365 void OBJECT_OT_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00366 {
00367     /* identifiers */
00368     ot->name = "Add Object";
00369     ot->description = "Add an object to the scene";
00370     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_add";
00371     
00372     /* api callbacks */
00373     ot->invoke = ED_object_add_generic_invoke;
00374     ot->exec = object_add_exec;
00375     
00376     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
00377     
00378     /* flags */
00379     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00380     
00381     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", object_type_items, 0, "Type", "");
00382 
00383     ED_object_add_generic_props(ot, TRUE);
00384 }

00386 /********************* Add Effector Operator ********************/
00387 /* copy from rna_object_force.c*/
00388 static EnumPropertyItem field_type_items[] = {
00389     {PFIELD_FORCE, "FORCE", ICON_FORCE_FORCE, "Force", ""},
00390     {PFIELD_WIND, "WIND", ICON_FORCE_WIND, "Wind", ""},
00391     {PFIELD_VORTEX, "VORTEX", ICON_FORCE_VORTEX, "Vortex", ""},
00392     {PFIELD_MAGNET, "MAGNET", ICON_FORCE_MAGNETIC, "Magnetic", ""},
00393     {PFIELD_HARMONIC, "HARMONIC", ICON_FORCE_HARMONIC, "Harmonic", ""},
00394     {PFIELD_CHARGE, "CHARGE", ICON_FORCE_CHARGE, "Charge", ""},
00395     {PFIELD_LENNARDJ, "LENNARDJ", ICON_FORCE_LENNARDJONES, "Lennard-Jones", ""},
00396     {PFIELD_TEXTURE, "TEXTURE", ICON_FORCE_TEXTURE, "Texture", ""},
00397     {PFIELD_GUIDE, "GUIDE", ICON_FORCE_CURVE, "Curve Guide", ""},
00398     {PFIELD_BOID, "BOID", ICON_FORCE_BOID, "Boid", ""},
00399     {PFIELD_TURBULENCE, "TURBULENCE", ICON_FORCE_TURBULENCE, "Turbulence", ""},
00400     {PFIELD_DRAG, "DRAG", ICON_FORCE_DRAG, "Drag", ""},
00401     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00402 
00403 /* for effector add primitive operators */
00404 static Object *effector_add_type(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, int type)
00405 {
00406     Object *ob;
00407     int enter_editmode;
00408     unsigned int layer;
00409     float loc[3], rot[3];
00410     float mat[4][4];
00411     
00412     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op);
00413 
00414     if (!ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL))
00415         return NULL;
00416 
00417     if (type==PFIELD_GUIDE) {
00418         ob= ED_object_add_type(C, OB_CURVE, loc, rot, FALSE, layer);
00419         rename_id(&ob->id, "CurveGuide");
00420 
00421         ((Curve*)ob->data)->flag |= CU_PATH|CU_3D;
00422         ED_object_enter_editmode(C, 0);
00423         ED_object_new_primitive_matrix(C, ob, loc, rot, mat);
00424         BLI_addtail(object_editcurve_get(ob), add_nurbs_primitive(C, mat, CU_NURBS|CU_PRIM_PATH, 1));
00425 
00426         if (!enter_editmode)
00427             ED_object_exit_editmode(C, EM_FREEDATA);
00428     }
00429     else {
00430         ob= ED_object_add_type(C, OB_EMPTY, loc, rot, FALSE, layer);
00431         rename_id(&ob->id, "Field");
00432 
00433         switch(type) {
00434             case PFIELD_WIND:
00435             case PFIELD_VORTEX:
00436                 ob->empty_drawtype = OB_SINGLE_ARROW;
00437                 break;
00438         }
00439     }
00440 
00441     ob->pd= object_add_collision_fields(type);
00442 
00443     DAG_scene_sort(CTX_data_main(C), CTX_data_scene(C));
00444 
00445     return ob;
00446 }
00447 
00448 /* for object add operator */
00449 static int effector_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00450 {
00451     if (effector_add_type(C, op, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type")) == NULL)
00452         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00453 
00454     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00455 }

00478 /* ***************** Add Camera *************** */
00479 
00480 static int object_camera_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00481 {
00482     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00483     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00484     Object *ob;
00485     int enter_editmode;
00486     unsigned int layer;
00487     float loc[3], rot[3];
00488     
00489     /* force view align for cameras */
00490     RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "view_align", TRUE);
00491     
00492     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op);
00493 
00494     if (!ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL))
00495         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00496 
00497     ob= ED_object_add_type(C, OB_CAMERA, loc, rot, FALSE, layer);
00498     
00499     if (v3d) {
00500         if (v3d->camera == NULL)
00501             v3d->camera = ob;
00502         if (v3d->scenelock && scene->camera==NULL) {
00503             scene->camera = ob;
00504         }
00505     }
00506 
00507     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00508 }

00522     
00523     /* flags */
00524     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00525         
00526     ED_object_add_generic_props(ot, TRUE);
00527     
00528     /* hide this for cameras, default */
00529     prop= RNA_struct_type_find_property(ot->srna, "view_align");
00530     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN);
00531 
00532 }

00535 /* ***************** add primitives *************** */
00536 static int object_metaball_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00537 {
00538     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00539     /*MetaElem *elem;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00540     int newob= 0;
00541     int enter_editmode;
00542     unsigned int layer;
00543     float loc[3], rot[3];
00544     float mat[4][4];
00545     
00546     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op); // XXX these props don't get set right when only exec() is called
00547 
00548     if (!ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL))
00549         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00550     
00551     if (obedit==NULL || obedit->type!=OB_MBALL) {
00552         obedit= ED_object_add_type(C, OB_MBALL, loc, rot, TRUE, layer);
00553         newob = 1;
00554     }
00555     else DAG_id_tag_update(&obedit->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00556     
00557     ED_object_new_primitive_matrix(C, obedit, loc, rot, mat);
00558     
00559     /* elem= (MetaElem *) */ add_metaball_primitive(C, mat, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type"), newob);
00560 
00561     /* userdef */
00562     if (newob && !enter_editmode) {
00563         ED_object_exit_editmode(C, EM_FREEDATA);
00564     }
00565     
00566     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, obedit);
00567     
00568     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00569 }
00570 
00571 static int object_metaball_add_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00572 {
00573     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00574     uiPopupMenu *pup;
00575     uiLayout *layout;
00576 
00577     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op);
00578 
00579     pup= uiPupMenuBegin(C, op->type->name, ICON_NONE);
00580     layout= uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
00581     if (!obedit || obedit->type == OB_MBALL)
00582         uiItemsEnumO(layout, op->type->idname, "type");
00583     else
00584         uiItemsEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_metaball_add", "type");
00585     uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
00586 
00587     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00588 }

00609 static int object_add_text_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00610 {
00611     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00612     int enter_editmode;
00613     unsigned int layer;
00614     float loc[3], rot[3];
00615     
00616     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op); // XXX these props don't get set right when only exec() is called
00617     if (!ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL))
00618         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00619     
00620     if (obedit && obedit->type==OB_FONT)
00621         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00622 
00623     obedit= ED_object_add_type(C, OB_FONT, loc, rot, enter_editmode, layer);
00624     
00625     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, obedit);
00626     
00627     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00628 }

00646 
00647 static int object_armature_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00648 {
00649     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00650     View3D *v3d= CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00651     RegionView3D *rv3d= CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00652     int newob= 0;
00653     int enter_editmode;
00654     unsigned int layer;
00655     float loc[3], rot[3];
00656     
00657     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op); // XXX these props don't get set right when only exec() is called
00658     if (!ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL))
00659         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00660     
00661     if ((obedit==NULL) || (obedit->type != OB_ARMATURE)) {
00662         obedit= ED_object_add_type(C, OB_ARMATURE, loc, rot, TRUE, layer);
00663         ED_object_enter_editmode(C, 0);
00664         newob = 1;
00665     }
00666     else DAG_id_tag_update(&obedit->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00667     
00668     if (obedit==NULL) {
00669         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Cannot create editmode armature");
00670         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00671     }
00672     
00673     /* v3d and rv3d are allowed to be NULL */
00674     add_primitive_bone(CTX_data_scene(C), v3d, rv3d);
00675 
00676     /* userdef */
00677     if (newob && !enter_editmode)
00678         ED_object_exit_editmode(C, EM_FREEDATA);
00679     
00680     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, obedit);
00681     
00682     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00683 }

00701 
00702 static const char *get_lamp_defname(int type)
00703 {
00704     switch (type) {
00705         case LA_LOCAL: return "Point";
00706         case LA_SUN: return "Sun";
00707         case LA_SPOT: return "Spot";
00708         case LA_HEMI: return "Hemi";
00709         case LA_AREA: return "Area";
00710         default:
00711             return "Lamp";
00712     }
00713 }
00714 
00715 static int object_lamp_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00716 {
00717     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00718     Object *ob;
00719     Lamp *la;
00720     int type= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00721     int enter_editmode;
00722     unsigned int layer;
00723     float loc[3], rot[3];
00724     
00725     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op);
00726     if (!ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL))
00727         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00728 
00729     ob= ED_object_add_type(C, OB_LAMP, loc, rot, FALSE, layer);
00730     la= (Lamp*)ob->data;
00731 
00732     la->type= type;
00733     rename_id(&ob->id, get_lamp_defname(type));
00734     rename_id(&la->id, get_lamp_defname(type));
00735 
00736     if (scene_use_new_shading_nodes(scene)) {
00737         ED_node_shader_default(scene, &la->id);
00738         la->use_nodes= 1;
00739     }
00740     
00741     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00742 }
00743 
00744 void OBJECT_OT_lamp_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00745 {   
00746     static EnumPropertyItem lamp_type_items[] = {
00747         {LA_LOCAL, "POINT", ICON_LAMP_POINT, "Point", "Omnidirectional point light source"},
00748         {LA_SUN, "SUN", ICON_LAMP_SUN, "Sun", "Constant direction parallel ray light source"},
00749         {LA_SPOT, "SPOT", ICON_LAMP_SPOT, "Spot", "Directional cone light source"},
00750         {LA_HEMI, "HEMI", ICON_LAMP_HEMI, "Hemi", "180 degree constant light source"},
00751         {LA_AREA, "AREA", ICON_LAMP_AREA, "Area", "Directional area light source"},
00752         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00753 
00754     /* identifiers */
00755     ot->name = "Add Lamp";
00756     ot->description = "Add a lamp object to the scene";
00757     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_lamp_add";
00758     
00759     /* api callbacks */
00760     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
00761     ot->exec = object_lamp_add_exec;
00762     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
00763     
00764     /* flags */
00765     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00766 
00767     /* properties */
00768     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", lamp_type_items, 0, "Type", "");
00769 
00770     ED_object_add_generic_props(ot, FALSE);
00771 }
00772 
00773 static int group_instance_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00774 {
00775     Group *group= BLI_findlink(&CTX_data_main(C)->group, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "group"));
00776 
00777     int enter_editmode;
00778     unsigned int layer;
00779     float loc[3], rot[3];
00780     
00781     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op);
00782     if (!ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL))
00783         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00784 
00785     if (group) {
00786         Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00787         Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00788         Object *ob= ED_object_add_type(C, OB_EMPTY, loc, rot, FALSE, layer);
00789         rename_id(&ob->id, group->id.name+2);
00790         ob->dup_group= group;
00791         ob->transflag |= OB_DUPLIGROUP;
00792         id_lib_extern(&group->id);
00793 
00794         /* works without this except if you try render right after, see: 22027 */
00795         DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00796 
00797         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_ACTIVE, CTX_data_scene(C));
00798 
00799         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00800     }
00801 
00802     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00803 }
00804 
00805 static int object_speaker_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00806 {
00807     Object *ob;
00808     int enter_editmode;
00809     unsigned int layer;
00810     float loc[3], rot[3];
00811     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00812 
00813     object_add_generic_invoke_options(C, op);
00814     if (!ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL))
00815         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00816 
00817     ob= ED_object_add_type(C, OB_SPEAKER, loc, rot, FALSE, layer);
00818     
00819     /* to make it easier to start using this immediately in NLA, a default sound clip is created
00820      * ready to be moved around to retime the sound and/or make new sound clips
00821      */
00822     {
00823         /* create new data for NLA hierarchy */
00824         AnimData *adt = BKE_id_add_animdata(&ob->id);
00825         NlaTrack *nlt = add_nlatrack(adt, NULL);
00826         NlaStrip *strip = add_nla_soundstrip(CTX_data_scene(C), ob->data);
00827         strip->start = CFRA;
00828         strip->end += strip->start;
00829         
00830         /* hook them up */
00831         BKE_nlatrack_add_strip(nlt, strip);
00832         
00833         /* auto-name the strip, and give the track an interesting name  */
00834         strcpy(nlt->name, "SoundTrack");
00835         BKE_nlastrip_validate_name(adt, strip);
00836         
00837         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00838     }
00839 
00840     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00841 }

00885 
00886 /**************************** Delete Object *************************/
00887 
00888 /* remove base from a specific scene */
00889 /* note: now unlinks constraints as well */
00890 void ED_base_object_free_and_unlink(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Base *base)
00891 {
00892     DAG_id_type_tag(bmain, ID_OB);
00893     BLI_remlink(&scene->base, base);
00894     free_libblock_us(&bmain->object, base->object);
00895     if (scene->basact==base) scene->basact= NULL;
00896     MEM_freeN(base);
00897 }
00898 
00899 static int object_delete_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00900 {
00901     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00902     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00903     const short use_global= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "use_global");
00904     /* int islamp= 0; */ /* UNUSED */
00905     
00906     if (CTX_data_edit_object(C)) 
00907         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00908     
00909     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_bases) {
00910 
00911         /* if (base->object->type==OB_LAMP) islamp= 1; */
00912 
00913         /* deselect object -- it could be used in other scenes */
00914         base->object->flag &= ~SELECT;
00915 
00916         /* remove from current scene only */
00917         ED_base_object_free_and_unlink(bmain, scene, base);
00918 
00919         if (use_global) {
00920             Scene *scene_iter;
00921             Base *base_other;
00922 
00923             for (scene_iter= bmain->scene.first; scene_iter; scene_iter= scene_iter->id.next) {
00924                 if (scene_iter != scene && !(scene_iter->id.lib)) {
00925                     base_other= object_in_scene(base->object, scene_iter);
00926                     if (base_other) {
00927                         ED_base_object_free_and_unlink(bmain, scene_iter, base_other);
00928                     }
00929                 }
00930             }
00931         }
00932         /* end global */
00933 
00934     }
00935     CTX_DATA_END;
00936 
00937     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00938     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00939     
00940     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_ACTIVE, scene);
00941     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_LAYER_CONTENT, scene);
00942     
00943     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00944 }
00945 
00946 void OBJECT_OT_delete(wmOperatorType *ot)
00947 {
00948     /* identifiers */
00949     ot->name = "Delete";
00950     ot->description = "Delete selected objects";
00951     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_delete";
00952     
00953     /* api callbacks */
00954     ot->invoke = WM_operator_confirm;
00955     ot->exec = object_delete_exec;
00956     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
00957     
00958     /* flags */
00959     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00960 
00961     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "use_global", 0, "Delete Globally", "Remove object from all scenes");
00962 }
00963 
00964 /**************************** Copy Utilities ******************************/
00965 
00966 /* after copying objects, copied data should get new pointers */
00967 static void copy_object_set_idnew(bContext *C, int dupflag)
00968 {
00969     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00970     Material *ma, *mao;
00971     ID *id;
00972     int a;
00973     
00974     /* XXX check object pointers */
00975     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00976         object_relink(ob);
00977     }
00978     CTX_DATA_END;
00979     
00980     /* materials */
00981     if ( dupflag & USER_DUP_MAT) {
00982         mao= bmain->mat.first;
00983         while (mao) {
00984             if (mao->id.newid) {
00985                 
00986                 ma= (Material *)mao->id.newid;
00987                 
00988                 if (dupflag & USER_DUP_TEX) {
00989                     for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00990                         if (ma->mtex[a]) {
00991                             id= (ID *)ma->mtex[a]->tex;
00992                             if (id) {
00993                                 ID_NEW_US(ma->mtex[a]->tex)
00994                                 else ma->mtex[a]->tex= copy_texture(ma->mtex[a]->tex);
00995                                 id->us--;
00996                             }
00997                         }
00998                     }
00999                 }
01000 #if 0 // XXX old animation system
01001                 id= (ID *)ma->ipo;
01002                 if (id) {
01003                     ID_NEW_US(ma->ipo)
01004                     else ma->ipo= copy_ipo(ma->ipo);
01005                     id->us--;
01006                 }
01007 #endif // XXX old animation system
01008             }
01009             mao= mao->id.next;
01010         }
01011     }
01012     
01013 #if 0 // XXX old animation system
01014     /* lamps */
01015     if ( dupflag & USER_DUP_IPO) {
01016         Lamp *la= bmain->lamp.first;
01017         while (la) {
01018             if (la->id.newid) {
01019                 Lamp *lan= (Lamp *)la->id.newid;
01020                 id= (ID *)lan->ipo;
01021                 if (id) {
01022                     ID_NEW_US(lan->ipo)
01023                     else lan->ipo= copy_ipo(lan->ipo);
01024                     id->us--;
01025                 }
01026             }
01027             la= la->id.next;
01028         }
01029     }
01030     
01031     /* ipos */
01032     ipo= bmain->ipo.first;
01033     while (ipo) {
01034         if (ipo->id.lib==NULL && ipo->id.newid) {
01035             Ipo *ipon= (Ipo *)ipo->id.newid;
01036             IpoCurve *icu;
01037             for (icu= ipon->curve.first; icu; icu= icu->next) {
01038                 if (icu->driver) {
01039                     ID_NEW(icu->driver->ob);
01040                 }
01041             }
01042         }
01043         ipo= ipo->id.next;
01044     }
01045 #endif // XXX old animation system
01046     
01047     set_sca_new_poins();
01048     
01049     clear_id_newpoins();
01050 }
01051 
01052 /********************* Make Duplicates Real ************************/
01053 
01054 static void make_object_duplilist_real(bContext *C, Scene *scene, Base *base,
01055                                        const short use_base_parent,
01056                                        const short use_hierarchy)
01057 {
01058     ListBase *lb;
01059     DupliObject *dob;
01060     GHash *dupli_gh= NULL, *parent_gh= NULL;
01061     
01062     if (!(base->object->transflag & OB_DUPLI))
01063         return;
01064     
01065     lb= object_duplilist(scene, base->object);
01066 
01067     if (use_hierarchy || use_base_parent) {
01068         dupli_gh= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "make_object_duplilist_real dupli_gh");
01069         parent_gh= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_pairhash, BLI_ghashutil_paircmp, "make_object_duplilist_real parent_gh");
01070     }
01071     
01072     for (dob= lb->first; dob; dob= dob->next) {
01073         Base *basen;
01074         Object *ob= copy_object(dob->ob);
01075         /* font duplis can have a totcol without material, we get them from parent
01076          * should be implemented better...
01077          */
01078         if (ob->mat==NULL) ob->totcol= 0;
01079         
01080         basen= MEM_dupallocN(base);
01081         basen->flag &= ~(OB_FROMDUPLI|OB_FROMGROUP);
01082         ob->flag= basen->flag;
01083         basen->lay= base->lay;
01084         BLI_addhead(&scene->base, basen);   /* addhead: othwise eternal loop */
01085         basen->object= ob;
01086         
01087         /* make sure apply works */
01088         BKE_free_animdata(&ob->id); 
01089         ob->adt = NULL;
01090         
01091         ob->parent= NULL;
01092         ob->constraints.first= ob->constraints.last= NULL;
01093         ob->disp.first= ob->disp.last= NULL;
01094         ob->transflag &= ~OB_DUPLI; 
01095         ob->lay= base->lay;
01096         
01097         copy_m4_m4(ob->obmat, dob->mat);
01098         object_apply_mat4(ob, ob->obmat, FALSE, FALSE);
01099 
01100         if (dupli_gh)
01101             BLI_ghash_insert(dupli_gh, dob, ob);
01102         if (parent_gh)
01103             BLI_ghash_insert(parent_gh, BLI_ghashutil_pairalloc(dob->ob, dob->index), ob);
01104     }
01105     
01106     if (use_hierarchy) {
01107         for (dob= lb->first; dob; dob= dob->next) {
01108             /* original parents */
01109             Object *ob_src=     dob->ob;
01110             Object *ob_src_par= ob_src->parent;
01111 
01112             Object *ob_dst=     BLI_ghash_lookup(dupli_gh, dob);
01113             Object *ob_dst_par= NULL;
01114 
01115             /* find parent that was also made real */
01116             if (ob_src_par) {
01117                 GHashPair *pair = BLI_ghashutil_pairalloc(ob_src_par, dob->index);
01118                 ob_dst_par = BLI_ghash_lookup(parent_gh, pair);
01119                 BLI_ghashutil_pairfree(pair);
01120             }
01121 
01122             if (ob_dst_par) {
01123                 /* allow for all possible parent types */
01124                 ob_dst->partype= ob_src->partype;
01125                 BLI_strncpy(ob_dst->parsubstr, ob_src->parsubstr, sizeof(ob_dst->parsubstr));
01126                 ob_dst->par1= ob_src->par1;
01127                 ob_dst->par2= ob_src->par2;
01128                 ob_dst->par3= ob_src->par3;
01129 
01130                 copy_m4_m4(ob_dst->parentinv, ob_src->parentinv);
01131 
01132                 ob_dst->parent= ob_dst_par;
01133             }
01134             else if (use_base_parent) {
01135                 ob_dst->parent= base->object;
01136                 ob_dst->partype= PAROBJECT;
01137             }
01138 
01139             if (ob_dst->parent) {
01140                 invert_m4_m4(ob_dst->parentinv, dob->mat);
01141 
01142                 /* note, this may be the parent of other objects, but it should
01143                  * still work out ok */
01144                 object_apply_mat4(ob_dst, dob->mat, FALSE, TRUE);
01145 
01146                 /* to set ob_dst->orig and in case theres any other discrepicies */
01147                 DAG_id_tag_update(&ob_dst->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
01148             }
01149         }
01150     }
01151     else if (use_base_parent) {
01152         /* since we are ignoring the internal hierarchy - parent all to the
01153          * base object */
01154         for (dob= lb->first; dob; dob= dob->next) {
01155             /* original parents */
01156             Object *ob_dst= BLI_ghash_lookup(dupli_gh, dob);
01157 
01158             ob_dst->parent= base->object;
01159             ob_dst->partype= PAROBJECT;
01160 
01161             /* similer to the code above, see comments */
01162             invert_m4_m4(ob_dst->parentinv, dob->mat);
01163             object_apply_mat4(ob_dst, dob->mat, FALSE, TRUE);
01164             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob_dst->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
01165 
01166 
01167         }
01168     }
01169 
01170     if (dupli_gh)
01171         BLI_ghash_free(dupli_gh, NULL, NULL);
01172     if (parent_gh)
01173         BLI_ghash_free(parent_gh, BLI_ghashutil_pairfree, NULL);
01174 
01175     copy_object_set_idnew(C, 0);
01176     
01177     free_object_duplilist(lb);
01178     
01179     base->object->transflag &= ~OB_DUPLI;
01180 }
01181 
01182 static int object_duplicates_make_real_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01183 {
01184     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01185     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01186 
01187     const short use_base_parent= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "use_base_parent");
01188     const short use_hierarchy= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "use_hierarchy");
01189     
01190     clear_id_newpoins();
01191         
01192     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
01193         make_object_duplilist_real(C, scene, base, use_base_parent, use_hierarchy);
01194 
01195         /* dependencies were changed */
01196         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARENT, base->object);
01197     }
01198     CTX_DATA_END;
01199 
01200     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01201     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01202     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE, scene);
01203     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, NULL);
01204     
01205     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01206 }
01207 
01208 void OBJECT_OT_duplicates_make_real(wmOperatorType *ot)
01209 {
01210     
01211     /* identifiers */
01212     ot->name = "Make Duplicates Real";
01213     ot->description = "Make dupli objects attached to this object real";
01214     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_duplicates_make_real";
01215     
01216     /* api callbacks */
01217     ot->exec = object_duplicates_make_real_exec;
01218     
01219     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
01220     
01221     /* flags */
01222     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01223 
01224     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "use_base_parent", 0, "Parent", "Parent newly created objects to the original duplicator");
01225     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "use_hierarchy", 0, "Keep Hierarchy", "Maintain parent child relationships");
01226 }
01227 
01228 /**************************** Convert **************************/
01229 
01230 static EnumPropertyItem convert_target_items[]= {
01231     {OB_CURVE, "CURVE", ICON_OUTLINER_OB_CURVE, "Curve from Mesh/Text", ""},
01232     {OB_MESH, "MESH", ICON_OUTLINER_OB_MESH, "Mesh from Curve/Meta/Surf/Text", ""},
01233     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01234 
01235 static void curvetomesh(Scene *scene, Object *ob) 
01236 {
01237     if (ob->disp.first == NULL)
01238         makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, ob, 0); /* force creation */
01239 
01240     nurbs_to_mesh(ob); /* also does users */
01241 
01242     if (ob->type == OB_MESH)
01243         object_free_modifiers(ob);
01244 }
01245 
01246 static int convert_poll(bContext *C)
01247 {
01248     Object *obact= CTX_data_active_object(C);
01249     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01250 
01251     return (!scene->id.lib && obact && scene->obedit != obact && (obact->flag & SELECT) && !(obact->id.lib));
01252 }
01253 
01254 /* Helper for convert_exec */
01255 static Base *duplibase_for_convert(Scene *scene, Base *base, Object *ob)
01256 {
01257     Object *obn;
01258     Base *basen;
01259 
01260     if (ob == NULL) {
01261         ob= base->object;
01262     }
01263 
01264     obn= copy_object(ob);
01265     obn->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
01266 
01267     basen= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(Base), "duplibase");
01268     *basen= *base;
01269     BLI_addhead(&scene->base, basen);   /* addhead: otherwise eternal loop */
01270     basen->object= obn;
01271     basen->flag |= SELECT;
01272     obn->flag |= SELECT;
01273     base->flag &= ~SELECT;
01274     ob->flag &= ~SELECT;
01275 
01276     return basen;
01277 }
01278 
01279 static int convert_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01280 {
01281     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01282     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01283     Base *basen=NULL, *basact=NULL, *basedel=NULL;
01284     Object *ob, *ob1, *newob, *obact= CTX_data_active_object(C);
01285     DerivedMesh *dm;
01286     Curve *cu;
01287     Nurb *nu;
01288     MetaBall *mb;
01289     Mesh *me;
01290     const short target= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "target");
01291     const short keep_original= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "keep_original");
01292     int a, mballConverted= 0;
01293 
01294     /* don't forget multiple users! */
01295 
01296     /* reset flags */
01297     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
01298         ob= base->object;
01299         ob->flag &= ~OB_DONE;
01300 
01301         /* flag data thats not been edited (only needed for !keep_original) */
01302         if (ob->data) {
01303             ((ID *)ob->data)->flag |= LIB_DOIT;
01304         }
01305     }
01306     CTX_DATA_END;
01307 
01308     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
01309         ob= base->object;
01310 
01311         if (ob->flag & OB_DONE || !IS_TAGGED(ob->data)) {
01312             if (ob->type != target) {
01313                 base->flag &= ~SELECT;
01314                 ob->flag &= ~SELECT;
01315             }
01316 
01317             /* obdata already modified */
01318             if (!IS_TAGGED(ob->data)) {
01319                 /* When 2 objects with linked data are selected, converting both
01320                  * would keep modifiers on all but the converted object [#26003] */
01321                 if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
01322                     object_free_modifiers(ob);  /* after derivedmesh calls! */
01323                 }
01324             }
01325         }
01326         else if (ob->type==OB_MESH && target == OB_CURVE) {
01327             ob->flag |= OB_DONE;
01328 
01329             if (keep_original) {
01330                 basen= duplibase_for_convert(scene, base, NULL);
01331                 newob= basen->object;
01332 
01333                 /* decrement original mesh's usage count  */
01334                 me= newob->data;
01335                 me->id.us--;
01336 
01337                 /* make a new copy of the mesh */
01338                 newob->data= copy_mesh(me);
01339             }
01340             else {
01341                 newob = ob;
01342             }
01343 
01344             mesh_to_curve(scene, newob);
01345 
01346             if (newob->type==OB_CURVE)
01347                 object_free_modifiers(newob);   /* after derivedmesh calls! */
01348         }
01349         else if (ob->type==OB_MESH && ob->modifiers.first) { /* converting a mesh with no modifiers causes a segfault */
01350             ob->flag |= OB_DONE;
01351 
01352             if (keep_original) {
01353                 basen= duplibase_for_convert(scene, base, NULL);
01354                 newob= basen->object;
01355 
01356                 /* decrement original mesh's usage count  */
01357                 me= newob->data;
01358                 me->id.us--;
01359 
01360                 /* make a new copy of the mesh */
01361                 newob->data= copy_mesh(me);
01362             }
01363             else {
01364                 newob = ob;
01365                 ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
01366             }
01367 
01368             /* make new mesh data from the original copy */
01369             /* note: get the mesh from the original, not from the copy in some
01370              * cases this doesnt give correct results (when MDEF is used for eg)
01371              */
01372             dm= mesh_get_derived_final(scene, newob, CD_MASK_MESH);
01373             /* dm= mesh_create_derived_no_deform(ob1, NULL);    this was called original (instead of get_derived). man o man why! (ton) */
01374 
01375             DM_to_mesh(dm, newob->data, newob);
01376 
01377             /* re-tessellation is called by DM_to_mesh */
01378 
01379             dm->release(dm);
01380             object_free_modifiers(newob);   /* after derivedmesh calls! */
01381         }
01382         else if (ob->type==OB_FONT) {
01383             ob->flag |= OB_DONE;
01384 
01385             if (keep_original) {
01386                 basen= duplibase_for_convert(scene, base, NULL);
01387                 newob= basen->object;
01388 
01389                 /* decrement original curve's usage count  */
01390                 ((Curve *)newob->data)->id.us--;
01391 
01392                 /* make a new copy of the curve */
01393                 newob->data= copy_curve(ob->data);
01394             }
01395             else {
01396                 newob= ob;
01397             }
01398 
01399             cu= newob->data;
01400 
01401             if (!newob->disp.first)
01402                 makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, newob, 0);
01403 
01404             newob->type= OB_CURVE;
01405             cu->type= OB_CURVE;
01406 
01407             if (cu->vfont) {
01408                 cu->vfont->id.us--;
01409                 cu->vfont= NULL;
01410             }
01411             if (cu->vfontb) {
01412                 cu->vfontb->id.us--;
01413                 cu->vfontb= NULL;
01414             }
01415             if (cu->vfonti) {
01416                 cu->vfonti->id.us--;
01417                 cu->vfonti= NULL;
01418             }
01419             if (cu->vfontbi) {
01420                 cu->vfontbi->id.us--;
01421                 cu->vfontbi= NULL;
01422             }
01423 
01424             if (!keep_original) {
01425                 /* other users */
01426                 if (cu->id.us>1) {
01427                     for (ob1= bmain->object.first; ob1; ob1=ob1->id.next) {
01428                         if (ob1->data==ob->data) {
01429                             ob1->type= OB_CURVE;
01430                             ob1->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
01431                         }
01432                     }
01433                 }
01434             }
01435 
01436             for (nu=cu->nurb.first; nu; nu=nu->next)
01437                 nu->charidx= 0;
01438 
01439             if (target == OB_MESH) {
01440                 curvetomesh(scene, newob);
01441 
01442                 /* meshes doesn't use displist */
01443                 freedisplist(&newob->disp);
01444             }
01445         }
01446         else if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
01447             ob->flag |= OB_DONE;
01448 
01449             if (target == OB_MESH) {
01450                 if (keep_original) {
01451                     basen= duplibase_for_convert(scene, base, NULL);
01452                     newob= basen->object;
01453 
01454                     /* decrement original curve's usage count  */
01455                     ((Curve *)newob->data)->id.us--;
01456 
01457                     /* make a new copy of the curve */
01458                     newob->data= copy_curve(ob->data);
01459                 }
01460                 else {
01461                     newob= ob;
01462 
01463                     /* meshes doesn't use displist */
01464                     freedisplist(&newob->disp);
01465                 }
01466 
01467                 curvetomesh(scene, newob);
01468             }
01469         }
01470         else if (ob->type==OB_MBALL && target == OB_MESH) {
01471             Object *baseob;
01472 
01473             base->flag &= ~SELECT;
01474             ob->flag &= ~SELECT;
01475 
01476             baseob= find_basis_mball(scene, ob);
01477 
01478             if (ob != baseob) {
01479                 /* if motherball is converting it would be marked as done later */
01480                 ob->flag |= OB_DONE;
01481             }
01482 
01483             if (!baseob->disp.first) {
01484                 makeDispListMBall(scene, baseob);
01485             }
01486 
01487             if (!(baseob->flag & OB_DONE)) {
01488                 baseob->flag |= OB_DONE;
01489 
01490                 basen= duplibase_for_convert(scene, base, baseob);
01491                 newob= basen->object;
01492 
01493                 mb= newob->data;
01494                 mb->id.us--;
01495 
01496                 newob->data= add_mesh("Mesh");
01497                 newob->type= OB_MESH;
01498 
01499                 me= newob->data;
01500                 me->totcol= mb->totcol;
01501                 if (newob->totcol) {
01502                     me->mat= MEM_dupallocN(mb->mat);
01503                     for (a=0; a<newob->totcol; a++) id_us_plus((ID *)me->mat[a]);
01504                 }
01505 
01506                 mball_to_mesh(&baseob->disp, newob->data);
01507 
01508                 if (obact->type == OB_MBALL) {
01509                     basact= basen;
01510                 }
01511 
01512                 mballConverted= 1;
01513             }
01514         }
01515         else {
01516             continue;
01517         }
01518 
01519         /* tag obdata if it was been changed */
01520 
01521         /* If the original object is active then make this object active */
01522         if (basen) {
01523             if (ob == obact) {
01524                 /* store new active base to update BASACT */
01525                 basact= basen;
01526             }
01527 
01528             basen= NULL;
01529         }
01530 
01531         if (!keep_original && (ob->flag & OB_DONE)) {
01532             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01533             ((ID *)ob->data)->flag &= ~LIB_DOIT; /* flag not to convert this datablock again */
01534         }
01535 
01536         /* delete original if needed */
01537         if (basedel) {
01538             if (!keep_original)
01539                 ED_base_object_free_and_unlink(bmain, scene, basedel);  
01540 
01541             basedel = NULL;
01542         }
01543     }
01544     CTX_DATA_END;
01545 
01546     if (!keep_original) {
01547         if (mballConverted) {
01548             Base *base= scene->base.first, *tmpbase;
01549             while (base) {
01550                 ob= base->object;
01551                 tmpbase= base;
01552                 base= base->next;
01553 
01554                 if (ob->type == OB_MBALL) {
01555                     ED_base_object_free_and_unlink(bmain, scene, tmpbase);
01556                 }
01557             }
01558         }
01559 
01560         /* delete object should renew depsgraph */
01561         DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01562     }
01563 
01564 // XXX  ED_object_enter_editmode(C, 0);
01565 // XXX  exit_editmode(C, EM_FREEDATA|EM_WAITCURSOR); /* freedata, but no undo */
01566 
01567     if (basact) {
01568         /* active base was changed */
01569         ED_base_object_activate(C, basact);
01570         BASACT= basact;
01571     }
01572     else if (BASACT->object->flag & OB_DONE) {
01573         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, BASACT->object);
01574         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DATA, BASACT->object);
01575     }
01576 
01577     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01578     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, scene);
01579     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
01580 
01581     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01582 }
01583 
01584 
01585 void OBJECT_OT_convert(wmOperatorType *ot)
01586 {
01587     /* identifiers */
01588     ot->name = "Convert to";
01589     ot->description = "Convert selected objects to another type";
01590     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_convert";
01591     
01592     /* api callbacks */
01593     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
01594     ot->exec = convert_exec;
01595     ot->poll = convert_poll;
01596     
01597     /* flags */
01598     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01599 
01600     /* properties */
01601     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "target", convert_target_items, OB_MESH, "Target", "Type of object to convert to");
01602     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "keep_original", 0, "Keep Original", "Keep original objects instead of replacing them");
01603 }
01604 
01605 /**************************** Duplicate ************************/
01606 
01607 /* 
01608  * dupflag: a flag made from constants declared in DNA_userdef_types.h
01609  * The flag tells adduplicate() weather to copy data linked to the object, or to reference the existing data.
01610  * U.dupflag for default operations or you can construct a flag as python does
01611  * if the dupflag is 0 then no data will be copied (linked duplicate) */
01612 
01613 /* used below, assumes id.new is correct */
01614 /* leaves selection of base/object unaltered */
01615 static Base *object_add_duplicate_internal(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Base *base, int dupflag)
01616 {
01617     Base *basen= NULL;
01618     Material ***matarar;
01619     Object *ob, *obn;
01620     ID *id;
01621     int a, didit;
01622 
01623     ob= base->object;
01624     if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
01625         ; /* nothing? */
01626     }
01627     else {
01628         obn= copy_object(ob);
01629         obn->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
01630         
01631         basen= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(Base), "duplibase");
01632         *basen= *base;
01633         BLI_addhead(&scene->base, basen);   /* addhead: prevent eternal loop */
01634         basen->object= obn;
01635         
01636         if (basen->flag & OB_FROMGROUP) {
01637             Group *group;
01638             for (group= bmain->group.first; group; group= group->id.next) {
01639                 if (object_in_group(ob, group))
01640                     add_to_group(group, obn, scene, basen);
01641             }
01642         }
01643         
01644         /* duplicates using userflags */
01645         if (dupflag & USER_DUP_ACT) {
01646             BKE_copy_animdata_id_action(&obn->id);
01647         }
01648         
01649         if (dupflag & USER_DUP_MAT) {
01650             for (a=0; a<obn->totcol; a++) {
01651                 id= (ID *)obn->mat[a];
01652                 if (id) {
01653                     ID_NEW_US(obn->mat[a])
01654                     else obn->mat[a]= copy_material(obn->mat[a]);
01655                     id->us--;
01656                     
01657                     if (dupflag & USER_DUP_ACT) {
01658                         BKE_copy_animdata_id_action(&obn->mat[a]->id);
01659                     }
01660                 }
01661             }
01662         }
01663         if (dupflag & USER_DUP_PSYS) {
01664             ParticleSystem *psys;
01665             for (psys=obn->particlesystem.first; psys; psys=psys->next) {
01666                 id= (ID*) psys->part;
01667                 if (id) {
01668                     ID_NEW_US(psys->part)
01669                     else psys->part= psys_copy_settings(psys->part);
01670                     
01671                     if (dupflag & USER_DUP_ACT) {
01672                         BKE_copy_animdata_id_action(&psys->part->id);
01673                     }
01674 
01675                     id->us--;
01676                 }
01677             }
01678         }
01679         
01680         id= obn->data;
01681         didit= 0;
01682         
01683         switch(obn->type) {
01684             case OB_MESH:
01685                 if (dupflag & USER_DUP_MESH) {
01686                     ID_NEW_US2( obn->data )
01687                     else {
01688                         obn->data= copy_mesh(obn->data);
01689                         
01690                         if (obn->fluidsimSettings) {
01691                             obn->fluidsimSettings->orgMesh = (Mesh *)obn->data;
01692                         }
01693                         
01694                         didit= 1;
01695                     }
01696                     id->us--;
01697                 }
01698                 break;
01699             case OB_CURVE:
01700                 if (dupflag & USER_DUP_CURVE) {
01701                     ID_NEW_US2(obn->data )
01702                     else {
01703                         obn->data= copy_curve(obn->data);
01704                         didit= 1;
01705                     }
01706                     id->us--;
01707                 }
01708                 break;
01709             case OB_SURF:
01710                 if (dupflag & USER_DUP_SURF) {
01711                     ID_NEW_US2( obn->data )
01712                     else {
01713                         obn->data= copy_curve(obn->data);
01714                         didit= 1;
01715                     }
01716                     id->us--;
01717                 }
01718                 break;
01719             case OB_FONT:
01720                 if (dupflag & USER_DUP_FONT) {
01721                     ID_NEW_US2( obn->data )
01722                     else {
01723                         obn->data= copy_curve(obn->data);
01724                         didit= 1;
01725                     }
01726                     id->us--;
01727                 }
01728                 break;
01729             case OB_MBALL:
01730                 if (dupflag & USER_DUP_MBALL) {
01731                     ID_NEW_US2(obn->data )
01732                     else {
01733                         obn->data= copy_mball(obn->data);
01734                         didit= 1;
01735                     }
01736                     id->us--;
01737                 }
01738                 break;
01739             case OB_LAMP:
01740                 if (dupflag & USER_DUP_LAMP) {
01741                     ID_NEW_US2(obn->data )
01742                     else {
01743                         obn->data= copy_lamp(obn->data);
01744                         didit= 1;
01745                     }
01746                     id->us--;
01747                 }
01748                 break;
01749                 
01750             case OB_ARMATURE:
01751                 obn->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
01752                 if (obn->pose) obn->pose->flag |= POSE_RECALC;
01753                     
01754                     if (dupflag & USER_DUP_ARM) {
01755                         ID_NEW_US2(obn->data )
01756                         else {
01757                             obn->data= copy_armature(obn->data);
01758                             armature_rebuild_pose(obn, obn->data);
01759                             didit= 1;
01760                         }
01761                         id->us--;
01762                     }
01763                         
01764                         break;
01765                 
01766             case OB_LATTICE:
01767                 if (dupflag!=0) {
01768                     ID_NEW_US2(obn->data )
01769                     else {
01770                         obn->data= copy_lattice(obn->data);
01771                         didit= 1;
01772                     }
01773                     id->us--;
01774                 }
01775                 break;
01776             case OB_CAMERA:
01777                 if (dupflag!=0) {
01778                     ID_NEW_US2(obn->data )
01779                     else {
01780                         obn->data= copy_camera(obn->data);
01781                         didit= 1;
01782                     }
01783                     id->us--;
01784                 }
01785                 break;
01786             case OB_SPEAKER:
01787                 if (dupflag!=0) {
01788                     ID_NEW_US2(obn->data )
01789                     else {
01790                         obn->data= copy_speaker(obn->data);
01791                         didit= 1;
01792                     }
01793                     id->us--;
01794                 }
01795                 break;
01796 
01797         }
01798 
01799         /* check if obdata is copied */
01800         if (didit) {
01801             Key *key = ob_get_key(obn);
01802             
01803             if (dupflag & USER_DUP_ACT) {
01804                 bActuator *act;
01805 
01806                 BKE_copy_animdata_id_action((ID *)obn->data);
01807                 if (key) {
01808                     BKE_copy_animdata_id_action((ID*)key);
01809                 }
01810 
01811                 /* Update the duplicated action in the action actuators */
01812                 for (act = obn->actuators.first; act; act = act->next) {
01813                     if (act->type == ACT_ACTION) {
01814                         bActionActuator* actact = (bActionActuator*) act->data;
01815                         if (ob->adt && actact->act == ob->adt->action) {
01816                             actact->act = obn->adt->action;
01817                         }
01818                     }
01819                 }
01820             }
01821             
01822             if (dupflag & USER_DUP_MAT) {
01823                 matarar= give_matarar(obn);
01824                 if (matarar) {
01825                     for (a=0; a<obn->totcol; a++) {
01826                         id= (ID *)(*matarar)[a];
01827                         if (id) {
01828                             ID_NEW_US( (*matarar)[a] )
01829                             else (*matarar)[a]= copy_material((*matarar)[a]);
01830                             
01831                             id->us--;
01832                         }
01833                     }
01834                 }
01835             }
01836         }
01837     }
01838     return basen;
01839 }
01840 
01841 /* single object duplicate, if dupflag==0, fully linked, else it uses the flags given */
01842 /* leaves selection of base/object unaltered.
01843  * note: don't call this within a loop since clear_* funcs loop over the entire database. */
01844 Base *ED_object_add_duplicate(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Base *base, int dupflag)
01845 {
01846     Base *basen;
01847     Object *ob;
01848 
01849     clear_id_newpoins();
01850     clear_sca_new_poins();  /* sensor/contr/act */
01851 
01852     basen= object_add_duplicate_internal(bmain, scene, base, dupflag);
01853     if (basen == NULL) {
01854         return NULL;
01855     }
01856 
01857     ob= basen->object;
01858 
01859     /* link own references to the newly duplicated data [#26816] */
01860     object_relink(ob);
01861     set_sca_new_poins_ob(ob);
01862 
01863     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01864     if (ob->data) {
01865         ED_render_id_flush_update(bmain, ob->data);
01866     }
01867 
01868     return basen;
01869 }
01870 
01871 /* contextual operator dupli */
01872 static int duplicate_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01873 {
01874     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01875     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01876     int linked= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "linked");
01877     int dupflag= (linked)? 0: U.dupflag;
01878     
01879     clear_id_newpoins();
01880     clear_sca_new_poins();  /* sensor/contr/act */
01881     
01882     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
01883         Base *basen= object_add_duplicate_internal(bmain, scene, base, dupflag);
01884         
01885         /* note that this is safe to do with this context iterator,
01886          * the list is made in advance */
01887         ED_base_object_select(base, BA_DESELECT);
01888 
01889         if (basen == NULL) {
01890             continue;
01891         }
01892 
01893         /* new object becomes active */
01894         if (BASACT==base)
01895             ED_base_object_activate(C, basen);
01896 
01897         if (basen->object->data) {
01898             DAG_id_tag_update(basen->object->data, 0);
01899         }
01900     }
01901     CTX_DATA_END;
01902 
01903     copy_object_set_idnew(C, dupflag);
01904 
01905     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01906     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01907 
01908     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
01909 
01910     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01911 }
01912 
01913 void OBJECT_OT_duplicate(wmOperatorType *ot)
01914 {
01915     PropertyRNA *prop;
01916     
01917     /* identifiers */
01918     ot->name = "Duplicate Objects";
01919     ot->description = "Duplicate selected objects";
01920     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_duplicate";
01921     
01922     /* api callbacks */
01923     ot->exec = duplicate_exec;
01924     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
01925     
01926     /* flags */
01927     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01928     
01929     /* to give to transform */
01930     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "linked", 0, "Linked", "Duplicate object but not object data, linking to the original data");
01931     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "mode", transform_mode_types, TFM_TRANSLATION, "Mode", "");
01932     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN);
01933 }
01934 
01935 /* **************** add named object, for dragdrop ************* */
01936 
01937 
01938 static int add_named_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01939 {
01940     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01941     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01942     Base *basen, *base;
01943     Object *ob;
01944     int linked= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "linked");
01945     int dupflag= (linked)? 0: U.dupflag;
01946     char name[MAX_ID_NAME-2];
01947 
01948     /* find object, create fake base */
01949     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "name", name);
01950     ob= (Object *)find_id("OB", name);
01951     if (ob==NULL) 
01952         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01953 
01954     base= MEM_callocN(sizeof(Base), "duplibase");
01955     base->object= ob;
01956     base->flag= ob->flag;
01957 
01958     /* prepare dupli */
01959     clear_id_newpoins();
01960     clear_sca_new_poins();  /* sensor/contr/act */
01961 
01962     basen= object_add_duplicate_internal(bmain, scene, base, dupflag);
01963 
01964     if (basen == NULL) {
01965         MEM_freeN(base);
01966         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01967     }
01968 
01969     basen->lay= basen->object->lay= scene->lay;
01970 
01971     ED_object_location_from_view(C, basen->object->loc);
01972     ED_base_object_activate(C, basen);
01973 
01974     copy_object_set_idnew(C, dupflag);
01975 
01976     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01977     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01978 
01979     MEM_freeN(base);
01980 
01981     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
01982 
01983     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01984 }
01985

01987 {
01988     /* identifiers */

01990     ot->description = "Add named object";
01991     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_add_named";
01992     
01993     /* api callbacks */
01994     ot->exec = add_named_exec;
01995     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
01996     
01997     /* flags */
01998     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01999     
02000     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "linked", 0, "Linked", "Duplicate object but not object data, linking to the original data");
02001     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "name", "Cube", MAX_ID_NAME-2, "Name", "Object name to add");
02002 }

02005 
02006 /**************************** Join *************************/
02007 static int join_poll(bContext *C)
02008 {
02009     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
02010     
02011     if (!ob || ob->id.lib) return 0;
02012     
02013     if (ELEM4(ob->type, OB_MESH, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_ARMATURE))
02014         return ED_operator_screenactive(C);
02015     else
02016         return 0;
02017 }
02018 
02019 
02020 static int join_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02021 {
02022     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
02023     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
02024 
02025     if (scene->obedit) {
02026         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "This data does not support joining in editmode");
02027         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02028     }
02029     else if (object_data_is_libdata(ob)) {
02030         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't edit external libdata");
02031         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02032     }
02033 
02034     if (ob->type == OB_MESH)
02035         return join_mesh_exec(C, op);
02036     else if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF))
02037         return join_curve_exec(C, op);
02038     else if (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE)
02039         return join_armature_exec(C, op);
02040     
02041     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02042 }
02043 
02044 void OBJECT_OT_join(wmOperatorType *ot)
02045 {
02046     /* identifiers */
02047     ot->name = "Join";
02048     ot->description = "Join selected objects into active object";
02049     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_join";
02050     
02051     /* api callbacks */
02052     ot->exec = join_exec;
02053     ot->poll = join_poll;
02054     
02055     /* flags */
02056     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02057 }
02058 
02059 /**************************** Join as Shape Key*************************/
02060 static int join_shapes_poll(bContext *C)
02061 {
02062     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
02063     
02064     if (!ob || ob->id.lib) return 0;
02065     
02066     /* only meshes supported at the moment */
02067     if (ob->type == OB_MESH)
02068         return ED_operator_screenactive(C);
02069     else
02070         return 0;
02071 }
02072 
02073 static int join_shapes_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02074 {
02075     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
02076     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
02077     
02078     if (scene->obedit) {
02079         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "This data does not support joining in editmode");
02080         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02081     }
02082     else if (object_data_is_libdata(ob)) {
02083         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't edit external libdata");
02084         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02085     }
02086     
02087     if (ob->type == OB_MESH)
02088         return join_mesh_shapes_exec(C, op);
02089     
02090     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02091 }
02092 
02093 void OBJECT_OT_join_shapes(wmOperatorType *ot)
02094 {

02098     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_join_shapes";

02100     /* api callbacks */
02101     ot->exec = join_shapes_exec;
02102     ot->poll = join_shapes_poll;
02103     
02104     /* flags */
02105     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02106 }
